entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Hardy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hardy Airport 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 39 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: NW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming east 30 gusting to 50 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except northeast 50 gusting to 70 over exposed coastal sections. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
